00003         
00004         function livesearch(term)
00005         {
00006                 if (term && term.length > 2)
00007                 {
00008                         return Servo.load({url:'<?php print $this->url_to(array('action' => 'live_search')); ?>?term='+encodeURIComponent(term),
00009                                 target:document.getElementById('searchbubble-body'),
00010                                 oncomplete: function(){$("#search-results").fadeIn(200);}});
00011                 }
00012                 else
00013                 {
00014                         return hidebubble();
00015                 }
00016         }
00017         
00018         function hidebubble()
00019         {
00020                 $("#search-results").fadeOut(200);
00021                 return false;
00022         }
00023         
00024         $(function(){
00025                 $('#diario-livesearch').submit(function(){return !livesearch(this.term.value);});
00026                 $('#f_term').keyup(function(){livesearch(this.value);});
00027                 $('a.dismiss-search').click(function(){return hidebubble();});
00028         });
00029         
00030 /*]]>*/
